meanings.sent1: The nonpathogenic bacteria in the yogurt are safe for consumption.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the nonpathogenic virus would not make him sick.
meanings.sent3: The nonpathogenic mushrooms decided to have a dance party instead of causing harm.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a nonpathogenic ray of sunshine, spreading joy without any harm.
meanings.sent5: The nonpathogenic flowers bloomed beautifully, bringing color without any danger.

meanings.sent1: The nonpathogenic strain of the virus was harmless to humans.

meanings.sent3: The nonpathogenic cat played with the yarn, ensuring no disease would spread.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was like a nonpathogenic melody, bringing joy without any illness.
meanings.sent5: The nonpathogenic plant thrived in the garden, adding beauty without any risk.
